biblinkcreator

Class DataStructure.WorldCatDownloadParameterData

  • java.lang.Object
    • biblinkcreator.DataStructure.DownloadParameterData
      • biblinkcreator.DataStructure.APIDownloadParameterData
        • biblinkcreator.DataStructure.WorldCatDownloadParameterData
  • Enclosing class:
    DataStructure

    public static class DataStructure.WorldCatDownloadParameterData
extends DataStructure.APIDownloadParameterData
    A static class which can be used to provide the download parameters of WorldCat API.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • WorldCatDownloadParameterData

        public WorldCatDownloadParameterData(int connectTimeout,
                                     int readTimeout,
                                     int insertBatchSize,
                                     int downloadBatchSize,
                                     int downloadDelay,
                                     int maxAllowedConsecutiveErrors,
                                     int attemptCount,
                                     int delayBetweenAttempts)
        Parameters:
        connectTimeout - The connection timeout in milliseconds.
        readTimeout - The read timeout in milliseconds.
        insertBatchSize - The number of records to be batch inserted after downloads.
        downloadBatchSize - The number of identifiers to be queried and downloaded in a single batch.
        downloadDelay - The delay in milliseconds between download batches.
        maxAllowedConsecutiveErrors - The number of consecutive errors allowed during the downloads.
        attemptCount - The number of retries after a failed download.
        delayBetweenAttempts - The delay in milliseconds between retries after a failed download.

    • Method Detail

        The number of retries after a failed download.

      • setDelayBetweenAttemps

        public void setDelayBetweenAttemps(int delayBetweenAttempts)
        Parameters:
        delayBetweenAttempts - The delay in milliseconds between retries after a failed download.
